bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign of dizziness affecting the head and eyes, in severe cases with an inability to recognize persons or things. Su wen 素問 74: 暴喑心痛，鬱冒不知人 , “Suddenly [they] turn mute and their heart aches. They experience pent-up malicious [qi] , and do not recognize people”.

② Pathological Condition identical with xue jue 血厥 . Lei zheng pu ji ben shi fang 類證普濟本事方 7: 名曰鬱冒，亦名血厥，婦人 多有之 , “It is called pent-up malicious [qi] . Another name is ‘blood recession’. Women often experience it”.
